message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire the product for $12,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the product's intrinsic value and your expected utility from it. I look forward to discussing how we can make this acquisition a mutually beneficial endeavor.
